description: Overview of the getAuthSession method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wagmi-core/functions/getAuthSession
---

Gets the current authentication session.

Returns the AuthSession instance if a user is authenticated, or null if not authenticated.
The AuthSession provides access to signing methods, user info, and session management.

## Import

```ts
import { getAuthSession } from "@alchemy/wagmi-core";
```

## Usage

```ts
const authSession = getAuthSession(config);
if (authSession) {
  const user = authSession.getUser();
  console.log("Authenticated as:", user.address);
} else {
  console.log("Not authenticated");
}
```

## Parameters

### config

`Config`

- The shared Wagmi/Alchemy config

## Returns

`AuthSession | null`
The current auth session, or null if not authenticated
